item.title: Let the user select an item in a modal dialog
item.description: After having used the shiny new YUI3 library for a project, it’s about time to share my YUI3 experiences with you. For the project I built an item selector: A modal dialog is openend and the user has to select an item. After selection the dialog is closed and the selected item is passed to a callback function. item.title: Add a delete button in each row of an ExtJS data grid
item.description: For usability reasons it is usually a good idea to add a delete button to each row of a data grid. If the user clicks on such a button, the whole row that contained the button will be deleted. item.title: Display an info text in a HTML input field if its focus is lost
item.description: Now that with Ext Core a light-weight version (just 25kB) of ExtJS has been released, I thought it’s time to build a nice example with it. The result is something very useful that you can see in actually a lot of web sites: Display a info text inside of a input text field if it is empty and does not have the focus.
